page.title: 09RAISELANDS CROFT PENRITH
page.content: Raiselands Croft is a council estate situated just outside of Penrith.It was built in 2 stages,the 1st stage was when the pre-war houses were built in 1936 and the 84 houses were finished in 1938.Another 24 were built in 1967.They are 3 bedroomed houses with an average family of 3 or 4 persons.Most of the houses are rented but 10 of them have been bought.There are three different types of houses,the pre-war houses,the modernized pre-war houses and the modern houses.Most of the people who live there are related in some way,many stay there for life.The nearest school for infants is Brunswick Road.At home the children have a grassland play area at the bottom of the estate.Raiselands Croft covers 8.09 acres.
